analyzed: nanu samādhi manaḥ viññāṇa samaṅgissa ati

original: Hañci samādhi manoviññāṇasamaṅgissa, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci samādhi manaḥ viññāṇa samaṅgissa no ca vata re vattabbe
samādhi manaḥ viññāṇa samaṅgissa sota viññāṇa samaṅgī saddam suṇāti iti

original: Hañci samādhi manoviññāṇasamaṅgissa, sotaviññāṇasamaṅgī saddaṁ suṇāti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci samādhi manaḥ viññāṇa samaṅgissa sota viññāṇa samaṅgī saddam suṇāti no ca vata re vattabbe
samādhi manaḥ viññāṇa samaṅgissa sota viññāṇa samaṅgī saddam suṇāti iti

original: Nanu paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇṭako vutto bhagavatāti?
analyzed: nanu paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇṭakaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā ati

original: Hañci paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇṭako vutto bhagavatā, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci paṭhamassa jhānassa saddaḥ kaṇṭakaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā tena vata re vattabbe

original: Paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇṭako vutto bhagavatāti, samāpanno saddaṁ suṇātīti?
analyzed: paṭhamassa jhānassa saddaḥ kaṇṭakaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā ati samāpannaḥ saddam suṇāti iti

original: Dutiyassa jhānassa vitakko vicāro kaṇṭako vutto bhagavatā, atthi tassa vitakkavicārāti?
analyzed: dutiyassa jhānassa vitakkaḥ vicāro kaṇṭakaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā atthi tassa vitakka vicārā ti

original: Paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇṭako vutto bhagavatāti, samāpanno saddaṁ suṇātīti?
analyzed: paṭhamassa jhānassa saddaḥ kaṇṭakaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā ati samāpannaḥ saddam suṇāti iti

original: catutthassa jhānassa assāsapassāso kaṇṭako … ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samāpannassa rūpasaññā
analyzed: catutthassa jhānassa assāsa passāso kaṇṭakaḥ ākāsa anañca āyatanam samāpannassa rūpa saññā

original: kaṇṭako … viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samāpannassa ākāsānañcāyatanasaññā kaṇṭako … ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ
analyzed: kaṇṭakaḥ viññāṇañcāyatanam samāpannassa ākāsānañcāyatana saññā kaṇṭakaḥ ākiñcaññāyatana
samāpannassa viññāṇañcāyatana saññā kaṇṭakaḥ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam samāpannassa

original: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā kaṇṭako … saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana saññā kaṇṭako saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā

original: ca kaṇṭako vutto bhagavatā, atthi tassa saññā ca vedanā cāti?
analyzed: ca kaṇṭakaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā atthi tassa saññā ca vedanā ca ati
